channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rudy Giuliani hospitalized with serious injuries after New Hampshire car accident
item.description: The former New York City mayor was taken to a trauma center with a fractured thoracic vertebrae, as well as lacerations and contusions, from a car acc...

item.title: Government shutdown looms as Congress returns after monthlong August recess
item.description: GOP lawmakers returning to Capitol Hill after the break will have to find a way to work with Democrats — or around them — as a government shutdown loo...

item.title: U.S. judge blocks government from deporting unaccompanied Guatemalan children
item.description: A U.S. federal judge on Sunday halted the Trump administration from deporting a group of migrant Guatemalan children already boarded onto planes.

item.title: Trump trade adviser blasts tariff ruling, calling it 'weaponized partisan injustice'
item.description: As the legal battle over tariffs intensifies, President Donald Trump's advisers are casting the ultimate outcome as pivotal to the future of the count...

item.title: Post-war Gaza plan sees relocation of population, 'digital token' for Palestinian land, the Washington Post reports
item.description: A post-war plan for Gaza is circulating within the Trump administration that would see the U.S. administer the war-torn enclave for at least a decade.
